contents:
This talk looked at Liberty Mutual’s transformation to Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery, and DevOps. For a large, heavily regulated industry, this task can not only be daunting, but viewed by many as impossible. Often, organizations try to reduce the friction through micro-fixes, but Eddie’s team asked how to change the culture to reduce the friction and concluded with the following final points:
 Don’t mandate DevOps. Give employees the chance to master their discipline with examples to set and follow. Favor deep end-to-end accomplishments over broad but incremental steps forward. Focus on taking the right teams far before encouraging broad adoption. Centralize the platforms and tools that your teams shouldn’t be thinking about. Provide foundational services/commodities and let teams stay on purpose. Incorporate contributions from everyone; don’t stifle autonomy. Stay open to new ways of working. Challenge security policies, but respect intentions. Find new ways to enforce concerns without abandoning precaution.
title: Organically DevOps: Building Quality and Security into the Software Supply Chain at Liberty Mutual

contents:
PhotoTune is a photo enhancement tool by Vyro AI that gathered more than Half a million downloads in less than a quarter of its release in early 2022.
PhotoTunes’s main features:
 Super resolute your photoes to 2x/3x/4x resolution Beautify your portraits by removing blemishes, smoothing your skin and adding HDR HDR delivers a higher contrast photo with reduced haze and noise Colorise adds color to old and black & white photos
title: PhotoTune by VYRO AI

contents:
Photo Studio is an all-in-one pro photo editing application with creative tool to stylise and enhance your images with 1M+ downloads since its inception in June 2021.
PhotoStudio Main Features:
 Crop the Photos to any dimension and adjust it for any social platform you want to share Use trending filters for your photos and popular filter categories available Use Sky Changer feature and replace sky from your photos to beautiful skies Use the Background eraser feature to erase and replace 100+ backgrounds Use Cloths feature to change Texture of your cloths to new stylish textures Use Adjustment tool to adjust and polish your photos Use LightFx to beautify photos with transparent Overlays Add text to photos with 100+ unique fonts Add stickers to pictures and create your own stickers Use Defocus Blur backgrounds feature to provide depth blur effects Enhance Photos up to 2x and 4x. Edit blurry, old, low quality, noisy photos Enhance your Face in photos using portrait enhance Bring old photos to life and give them colorize effect
title: PhotoStudio by VYRO AI

contents:
An entertainment platform that places interactive tablets in ride-share vehicles for the entertainment of passengers and the promotion of local businesses and brands which provides;
 Free Video content to stream by Media gaints like Paramount Pictures, Vevo and many famous content creators like Tasty, The Daily Show, etc. Full iHeart Radio experience where the riders can listen to iHearts best Radio station, their favourite artists and highly engaging podcasts. Free coupons and disounts to nearby stores and shops
title: SURF Rideshare

contents:
A simple android voice recording application I created a while back. It has following features;
 Record audio. Pause/Resume between a recording. Control recording bitrate. Save recording to local storage in a folder named Recording. View, Rename or delete all recordings.
title: Recording
GeoTrack

contents:
The application replaces manual telecom tower surveys. By digitalizing survey form data entry, syncing and report generation for multiple survey roles like Power Engineer, Civil, Design, etc.
This application was sold to MTN Nigeria and JAZZ (The largest telecom services provider in Pakistan).
title: Vesta Audit

contents:
Customer Insight Customer insight was a multi language application for Telecom Industry to monitor their network user’s experience and improve customer support. The application was meant to collect user’s network performance parameters to build coverage maps and find weak areas. The application also enabled the user to run call sms and internet speed tests for runtime diagnostics.
Application Screens The application UI was based on a View Pager an the user could swipe through the dashboard and test screens.
Dashboard The first screen of the application that gives the user all the basic information about the user’s network like carries’s name, technology and signal strength
Call Test The application was capable of a short call test that is usually performed in network quality surveys where a call to a number is made multiple times and the line is kept connected for 30 seconds. During this time the network quality parameters are monitored and can give the Network services providers information about the network quality.
SMS Test The SMS test works the same way the call test did. A few SMSs were generated from the phone to the same number and from sending to the tien of delivery the network quality was measured.
Internet Test The Internet test tested the ping, upload and the download speed for the conntected Wifi or data conntection
title: Customer Insight
